Title: God Sees
Writer: Tom Bernardo (written for television by), Michael Connelly (based on the novels by), Eric Ellis Overmyer (developed for television by)
Actors: Jamie Hector, Ryan Ahern, Vanessa Alameda, Erika Alexander
Plot: Bosch learns more about the dark past and murder of Billy Meadows. The credibility of a key witness threatens to undermine the Holland case. Edgar maneuvers to handle damning evidence. Dangerous men target Bosch.
